DataElement.preferredName: Patient Hot Flashes Medical History Start Date
DataElement.preferredDefinition: The medical history start date for the patients hot flashes.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Patient Hot Flashes Medical History Start Date
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: A person who receives medical attention, care, or treatment, or who is registered with medical professional or institution with the purpose to receive medical care when necessary._A sudden, temporary onset of body warmth, flushing, and sweating (often associated with menopause)._The date on which the medical history event begins.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: A person who requires medical care.

Concepts.definition: A person who receives medical attention, care, or treatment, or who is registered with medical professional or institution with the purpose to receive medical care when necessary.

Property.preferredName: Hot Flashes Medical History Start Date
Property.preferredDefinition: A sudden, temporary onset of body warmth, flushing, and sweating (often associated with menopause).:The date on which the medical history event begins.

Concepts.definition: A temporary feeling of intense body warmth, flushing, sometimes accompanied by sweating. A common, symptom of menopause; other conditions that can produce hot flushes include antidepressants and drugs blocking the effect of estrogens, carcinoid tumors and a sensitivity to sulfites or other food additives.
The date on which the medical history event begins.

ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: The date on which an observation or an event began.

RepresentationTerm.preferredDefinition: Have a beginning, in a temporal, spatial, or evaluative sense.:a particular day specified as the time something has, or will, happen.

Concepts.definition: Have a beginning, in a temporal, spatial, or evaluative sense; the point in space or time where something begins.
The particular day, month and year an event has happened or will happen.
